title: Habits
text:
Getting up

Turn off alarm
Get out of bed

title: Habits
text:
Going to sleep

Get in bed
Count sheep

title: Jupyter - Interactive prototyping with Python
text: Contact & Instructor: Samantha Wittke, CSC - IT Center for Science, Finland; samantha.wittke@csc.fi Description: In this training we will explore the use of Jupyter for interactive protoyping with Python. Jupyter is a versatile tool for executable notebooks available on multiple platforms from own computer to the cloud. The lesson will introduce the tool as an alternative to writing scripts and discuss the usecases for scripts versus notebooks. Eligibility for participation: Open for everyone, but most useful for researchers who code Time and date: 22.10 at XX.XX Expectations: Everyone can follow the lesson Grading: No grading
